title: Software
content: I'm active on many Open Source projects. Recently I am working mostly on
a CLI secrets manager that I built for myself, i.e., is a tool for geeks. Take a look at my
. Some others are related with blockchain (

title: Blog
content: In May 2020, I launched a new blog
. Right now there are just few posts but more and more will come in the future because I will post about everything I do . . . and I do a lot.

title: Movies
content: For a while, I made a few short movies, either alone or with friends. You can watch some of them on
. Some new movie is coming soon. In any case, your opinion is greatly welcome.

title: Technology
content: I quit my job as Technical Lead Manager at Tron Foundation in January to take a break from technology and do some art. More info in my
. Before I founded Passpack, the first Host-proof Hosting Online Password Manager in the world, and I was at Turo, Yahoo, and many other companies.

title: Books
content: If you can read Italian, I hope you will like my short novel "Giulia, io e lo scoglio" on
(for $1.99, who knows why). I am currently working on a new novel. When I feel ready, I will publish it on my blog. Something like 10 chapter per post.

title: Music
content: I was an active musician for years. I am trying to restart. You can listen my 2006 EP
on SoundCloud. More will come soon because I am working on new songs.

title: News
content: , I tweet passionately, mostly about cryptos, politics, and freedom. You can follow me, if you like. I am also very engaged by the absurd abuses on Julian Assange and the false narrative told around him.
Here a very clear article by Dr. Lissa Johnson

title: Freedom & Politics
content: I am very engaged by the absurd abuses on Julian Assange and the false narrative told around him.

title: Friends
content: Even if recently I am not very talkative, I like my friends. You can be my next one on
. I also use Facebook to share stuff and it is another way to follow what I do.

title: Art
content: Since the beginning of the 2020 I am painting again, after more than 20 years. I will make a website for that sooner or later. For now, you can follow me on
or on my new blog, which will try to put some order in the mess of what I am doing.

title: Photography
content: I travel often and take a lot of photos around the world. You can see them mostly on
. I will create an account somewhere to show them in a more organized way.

title: Contact Me
content: You can find me on Telegram, Signal, WhatsApp and many others messengers. But if you love emails, contact me
